alert.note: Alert for Fall River; Hermosa Foot Hills; Southern Black Hills; Southern Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 21 at 2:28PM MST until February 22 at 12:00PM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. * WHERE...The Fall River County Plains, the Hermosa Foot Hills, the Southern Foot Hills and the Southern Black Hills. * WHEN...Until noon MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The dangerously cold wind chills as low as 30 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the 5 1 1 app for your state.

area.areaDesc: Fall River; Hermosa Foot Hills; Southern Black Hills; Southern Foot Hills
